TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Talampo, title = Talampo, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Talampo} }

S.FORM: Talampo Itiniay i Fuli Cen no Hualien ko Talampo a niyaro', 71 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 127 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 98% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 124 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 2% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 3 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis91%, Paiwan2%, Seediq2%, roma4%.

Talampo Itiniay i Foli Cen no Hoalien ko Talampo a niyaro', 71 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 127 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 98% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 124 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 2% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 3 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis91%, Paiwan2%, Seediq2%, roma4%.
